title: Queens Night Market
perks: Affordable international food, live music, open-air experience
description: NYC’s most eclectic night market returns with international food, live shows, and weekend buzz.
aiSummary: Bustling Saturday night market in Queens with global eats, music, and a crowd-rich recording atmosphere.
studioNotes: Mic near food clusters for sizzle and chatter. Capture transitions between vendor zones and stage area.
